name: lab-dash
description: Lab Dash is a dashboard for lab environments and research teams. It aggregates important links, status widgets and notes into a central page, helping labs keep equipment, documents and tools organized and easily accessible.
features: Lab Dashboard: Centralized links, Status widgets, Team notes. Organize lab resources in one place.
Equipment Tracking: Device status, Maintenance schedules, Usage logs. Monitor lab equipment efficiently.
Resource Management: Document links, Tool access, Quick references. Keep important resources accessible.
Status Widgets: Real-time monitoring, Equipment availability, System health. Track lab operations at a glance.
Team Collaboration: Shared notes, Announcements, Task assignments. Keep the team coordinated.
Quick Links: Frequently used tools, Documentation access, External resources. Navigate lab resources quickly.
Custom Layout: Personalized dashboard, Widget arrangement, User preferences. Tailor the interface to your workflow.
Mobile Access: Responsive design, Mobile-friendly, On-the-go access. Check lab status from anywhere.
